title: Week 02: Univariate inference
description:
This week we'll discuss how to use continuous priors and make predictions 
for proportions. We'll also discuss how to use prior information to select prior distributions.

title: Week 03: Means and counts
description:
This week, we'll discuss Bayesian models for measurement and count data. 
Specifically, well explore using the normal distribution with known variance for
measurement data and the Poisson distribution for count data.

title: Week 01: Welcome to Bayesian statistics!
description:
This week we'll review some key results from probability and start discussing
Bayesian inference for a proportion.
